headline: Northrop Grumman (NOC): Assessing Value After Recent 5% Pullback in Share Price
summary: Northrop Grumman (NOC) shares slipped slightly over the past month, with the stock moving 5% lower. Investors keeping an eye on the defense sector are weighing recent developments in the broader market and considering industry trends. See our latest analysis for Northrop Grumman. Zooming out, Northrop Grumman’s 1-year total shareholder return sits at 16.1%, reflecting solid long-term gains even after a recent 5% slide in the share price over the past month.
